name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro
description: Legendary ergonomic shape refined to 63g wireless. Features Focus Pro 30K sensor, HyperSpeed wireless, and 90-hour battery. The most comfortable FPS mouse.

reviews.review_text: DA shape perfected. Best ergo mouse ever made.
Palm grip paradise. No hand fatigue in long sessions.
Wish it was a bit lighter but shape trumps weight.
